Icon wi- Alias WMO
Code		 WMO Description
' '00No significant weather observed
@cloudy01Clouds generally dissolving or becoming less developed during the past hour
' '02State of sky on the whole unchanged during the past hour
@cloudy03Clouds generally forming or developing during the past hour
@fog04Haze or smoke, or dust in suspension in the air, visibility equal to, or greater than, 1 km
@fog05Haze or smoke, or dust in suspension in the air, visibility less than 1 km
@fog10Mist
@fog11Diamond dust
@lightning12Distant lightning
@strong-wind18Squalls
@fog20Fog
@fog21PRECIPITATION
@rain-mix22Drizzle (not freezing) or snow grains
@rain23Rain (not freezing)
@snow24Snow
@rain-mix25Freezing drizzle or freezing rain
@thunderstorm26Thunderstorm (with or without precipitation)
@dust27BLOWING OR DRIFTING SNOW OR SAND
@dust28Blowing or drifting snow or sand, visibility equal to, or greater than, 1 km
@dust29Blowing or drifting snow or sand, visibility less than 1 km
@fog30FOG
@fog31Fog or ice fog in patches
@fog32Fog or ice fog, has become thinner during the past hour
@fog33Fog or ice fog, no appreciable change during the past hour
@fog34Fog or ice fog, has begun or become thicker during the past hour
@fog35Fog, depositing rime

@rain42Precipitation, heavy

@rain44Liquid precipitation, heavy

@snow48Freezing precipitation, heavy
